text: "Hopelessly Devoted to You" is a 1978 song by Olivia Newton-John. It was used in the 1978 movie Grease. It went to number 1 in Belgium, Canada, Ireland and the Netherlands, number 2 in Australia and the United Kingdom, number 3 in the United States and number 6 in New Zealand. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1979. Category:1978 songs Category:Olivia Newton-John songs Category:Soul songs
title: Hopelessly Devoted to You
